src:
【精彩推薦】習近平赴美簽協議？/中共對港三大動作

02 Nov 2019, 09:33

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月02日訊】新唐人為讀者推薦每日精彩文章和視頻節目：
港警暴行激民憤 香港開辦「自衞班」自香港爆發大規模抗議行動以來，港警越來越瘋狂的使用催淚彈、水炮車，以及真槍實彈等清場，無底線對示威者血腥鎮壓。為了對抗警員濫捕濫暴，香港中大學生會在校內舉辦相關「練武班」，教導自衛術及逃脫技巧以保護自己。
四中公報釋信號：中共對港三大可能動作剛閉幕的中共四中全會公報中，對輿論關注的香港反送中運動強硬回應，希望以法律手段為香港劃下一些紅線。一些學者專家和輿論分析認為，接下來中共可能會對香港有三大動作。
中共智囊曝明年最大危機 ：資金「缺水」中國經濟下行、外資出逃、外匯儲備下降、人民幣貶值等都對中國金融造成嚴重影響，有大陸學者日前表示，明年是中共還債高峰期，最大的危機在於資金「缺水」，市場資金供應鏈一旦出現問題，很可能誘發金融危機。
【直播回放】「112 求援國際，堅守自治」集會（中文翻譯）本週末，香港民眾繼續發起舉辦反極權反警暴活動。週四舉辦「831恐襲兩個月靜坐」，週六將有「112 求援國際，堅守自治」集會等。新唐人電視台和《大紀元時報》將進行全程追蹤和網絡直播，請鎖定新聞直播間。
習近平赴美簽協議？川普透露新計劃美中貿易戰持續至今16個月，有關這一談判的樂觀信息升溫。日前，美國總統川普（特朗普）表示，他計劃與習近平在愛荷華州會談，並簽署貿易協議，結束持續長達1年多的貿易戰。
中國豬肉價暴漲 一份回鍋肉賣400元網友驚呆中國大陸因非洲豬瘟和貿易戰的影響，豬肉價格不斷飆升。近日大陸網絡社群中熱傳一張菜單的照片顯示，某餐廳菜譜中的豬肉精品回鍋肉（10片）標價高達400元（人民幣，下同），讓一眾網友驚掉了下巴。店家回應稱，成本高、分量足，只能定這個價。
四中全會拉開文革序幕？學者:新疆模式或普及全國中共四中全會繼續強調「習核心」，強化「黨領導一切」。北京學者認為，這等於全面奏響了重回文革狀態的號角，中共未來可能用「新疆模式」統治全國。
全會公報重複55次 關鍵詞「堅持」映射習近平最大困境中共19屆四中全會的公報，沒有重大人事變動和習近平黨內權力受損跡象。但是出現了「堅持社會主義制度」、「堅持黨領導一切」和「堅持公有制主體」等55個「堅持」。輿論認為，越強調「堅持」的東西說明越不穩。
大量資金外逃 中國外儲見底 外債達3.5萬億美元受美中貿易戰影響，中國經濟增長速度降至27年來最低，加之資金大量外逃，外匯儲備持續下降。有研究機構稱，中共外匯儲備幾乎是負數，外債至少3萬億到3.5萬億美元，比官方數據高出1萬多億美元。
納瓦羅：三階段解決中共「7宗罪惡」美中貿易談判正在朝第一階段協議邁進，白宮貿易顧問納瓦羅（Peter Navarro）日前表示，即便第一階段協議進行順利，還須另外兩個階段，才能將中共的結構性「7宗罪惡」徹底解決。
「打倒習近平」呼聲震耳 習絕望地哭了如今大權在握的習近平也有過一段絕望的日子，文革開始時，習剛13歲就被打成反革命分子。中共黨校召開的批鬥會上，「打倒習近平」呼聲震耳，習媽媽齊心也被迫喊口號打倒兒子……一個雨夜，習偷偷回到家中，媽媽嚇壞了，舉報去了，習絕望地哭了，又絕望地跑進了雨夜。
中南海圍繞香港激鬥 港府各自為政局勢混亂中共高層內鬥延燒到香港，有英媒放風林鄭月娥將被北京撤下後，林鄭突然對成立獨立調查委員會鬆口，接著又出現香港警隊要出事訊號，然而，香港高等法院又頒布臨時禁制令，禁止港警被起底等等，港府各類自相矛盾的做法頻出。
揭秘：胡錦濤六字遊戲 江澤民中招胡錦濤作為中共總書記的執政10年，權力被江澤民架空，導致政令難行，習近平上台後大權獨攬，以反腐的名義，拿下江澤民的眾多親信大員，令江無比狼狽，而這一切與胡錦濤兩次「捉弄」江澤民有關。
「中共不代表中國人」 蓬佩奧智庫演講全文10月30日，美國國務卿蓬佩奧（Michael R. Pompeo）在保守派智庫紐約哈德遜研究所發表演講。他說美國以前一直期待中共治下的中國能變為民主國家，從而在多方面對中共縱容，但是現在終於意識到，中共對美國價值觀一直持敵視態度。
美前議長:中共是最大威脅 蓬佩奧:必須正面應對週二（10月29日），前美國國會眾議院議長金里奇呼籲美國認清中共本質是極權體制，也是美國最大威脅。次日，美國務卿蓬佩奧表示，美國已經認清了中共對美國的敵意，以及美中意識形態的根本對立，將正面迎擊中共。
FBI局長:反情報特別關注中共 大選或受其干擾美國聯邦調查局（FBI）局長雷（Christopher Wray）周三（10月30日）在國會作證時表示，FBI在反情報（反間諜）方面特別關注中共，並提醒美國要警惕中共傳播假消息，干擾明年總統大選。
美網安公司報告:中共竊海外手機信息 政要亦中刀美國一家知名網絡安全公司週四發佈報告，披露了與中共政府有牽連的中國駭客組織，利用一種新的惡意軟件竊取海外手機用戶發送的短訊和通話記錄的內情。據指，不但異議人士、記者容易成為這些駭客監視的目標，甚至一些國家軍政要員的手機通訊也被駭客竊取，而受害者往往不知情。
黃之鋒：中共可以禁止我參選 但不能讓所有人沉默「北京可以禁止我參選，但我拒絕保持沉默」，日前香港眾志秘書長黃之鋒撰文稱，民主始於公眾，他希望港人以選票讓外界聽到他們尋求民主的聲音，中共不能讓所有人沉默。
中南海圍繞香港激鬥 港府各自為政局勢混亂中共高層內鬥延燒到香港，有英媒放風林鄭月娥將被北京撤下後，林鄭突然對成立獨立調查委員會鬆口，接著又出現香港警隊要出事訊號，然而，香港高等法院又頒布臨時禁制令，禁止港警被起底等等，港府各類自相矛盾的做法頻出。
孟晚舟律師團遇挫 告加警違法欲阻引渡無果華為董事長任正非的長女、華為集團財務總監孟晚舟引渡案，目前正處於法庭聆訊階段。孟的律師團隊為中止孟被引渡到美國，攻擊加國警方在最初扣押孟晚舟時的執法行動涉嫌程序違法。但本週四的法庭文件顯示，加國騎警提交了多份宣誓書，斷然否認了辯方的相關指控。
人權組織：警隊被縱容 警暴日趨嚴重香港反送中抗爭運動持續進行，在10月31日萬聖節，有人發起到中環蘭桂芳進行蒙面派對，期間有港民及記者被警員以胡椒噴劑直噴面部，此外，在旺角的示威行動中，有社工被警察用警棍打得頭破血流。人權組織表示，警隊被縱容過度使用武力的情況愈來愈嚴重。人權監察發言人葉寬柔指出，港府的這些手段無助解決問題，必須回應市民的核心訴求。
香港淪為警察國家 美議員推「如水法案」加碼制裁香港局勢惡化被指已淪為「警察國家」，三名美國參議員日前提出《香港如水法案》（Hong Kong Be Water Act），要求「加碼」處理制裁壓迫港人言論、集會、遊行等基本權利的中港官員以及與其合作的人員。
管治香港更嚴？四中後中共提「完善」特首任免制剛結束的中共四中全會，首次提出對香港澳門「實行管治」。隨後中共官員又進一步解釋稱，要「完善特區行政長官的任免制度」。外界擔憂，中共可能要與港人要求的「雙普選」背道而馳。

【全球新聞】11月1日完整版


【禁聞】11月1日退黨精選


【江峰時刻】《川普對決中國》：方偉採訪美國重量級政治人物金里奇（gingrich）中國夢的實現就是美國夢的終結

FBI示警 美反擊中共人海諜戰及網絡諜戰10月30號，美國聯邦調查局長在國會眾議院國土安全委員會作證時表示，在反間諜領域，特別關注中國。

【拍案驚奇】香港會設國安局嗎？四中全會公報迴響 李嘉誠搭檔石禮謙 聲援示威震撼建制派

text:
[Wonderful recommendation] Xi Jinping went to the United States to sign an agreement? /The CCP’s three major actions against Hong Kong

02 Nov 2019, 09:33

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 02, 2019] NTDTV recommends daily wonderful articles and video programs for readers:
Hong Kong police atrocities provoked public outrage Since Hong Kong launched a "self-defense class" since the massive protests in Hong Kong, the Hong Kong police have increasingly used tear gas, water guns, and live ammunition to clear the field. There is no bottom line to suppress the bloody of the demonstrators. In order to counter the indiscriminate use of police officers, the Hong Kong University Students will hold relevant "training classes" on campus to teach self-defense techniques and escape skills to protect themselves.
The four Chinese communiques released the signal: The CCP’s communiqué on the Fourth Plenary Session of the Chinese Communist Party’s three major possible actions just closed, and the Hong Kong counter-delivery movement, which is concerned about public opinion, responded strongly and hoped to draw some red lines for Hong Kong by legal means. Some scholars and experts and public opinion analysis believe that the CCP may have three major moves in Hong Kong.
The CCP’s think tank exposed the biggest crisis next year: the “lack of water” in China’s economy, the fleeing of foreign capital, the decline in foreign exchange reserves, and the depreciation of the renminbi have all seriously affected China’s finance. Some mainland scholars have said that next year will be the peak period for the CCP’s debt repayment, the biggest crisis. In the case of funds “lack of water”, once there is a problem in the market capital supply chain, it is likely to induce a financial crisis.

Xi Jinping went to the United States to sign an agreement? Trump revealed that the new US-China trade war has continued for 16 months, and optimistic information about this negotiation has warmed up. A few days ago, US President Trump (Trump) said that he plans to hold talks with Xi Jinping in Iowa and sign a trade agreement to end the trade war that lasted for more than a year.
China's pork prices skyrocketed A pot of meat sold for 400 yuan netizens stunned China's mainland due to the impact of African swine fever and trade wars, pork prices continue to soar. Recently, a photo of a menu in the mainland online community showed that the price of pork in a restaurant recipe (10 pieces) was as high as 400 yuan (RMB, the same below), causing a group of netizens to stun the chin. The store responded that the cost is high and the weight is sufficient, and the price can only be fixed.
The Fourth Plenary Session kicked off the Cultural Revolution? Scholars: The Xinjiang Model or the popularization of the Fourth Plenary Session of the Chinese Communist Party continues to emphasize the "center of learning" and strengthen "the party leads everything." Beijing scholars believe that this is equivalent to fully clarifying the clarion call back to the Cultural Revolution. The CCP may rule the country with the "Xinjiang Model" in the future.
The plenary session repeated 55 times. The keyword "persistence" maps Xi Jinping's biggest predicament. The communique of the Fourth Plenary Session of the 19th CPC Central Committee has no major personnel changes and signs of impaired power within Xi Jinping. However, there have been 55 "persistences" such as "adhering to the socialist system", "holding on the party to lead everything" and "maintaining the main body of public ownership." Public opinion believes that the more emphasis on "persistence", the more unstable it is.
A large amount of capital fled China's foreign reserves bottomed out Foreign debt reached 3.5 trillion US dollars affected by the US-China trade war, China's economic growth rate fell to the lowest in 27 years, coupled with a large amount of capital flight, foreign exchange reserves continued to decline. Some research institutes say that the CCP’s foreign exchange reserves are almost negative, and the external debt is at least 3 trillion to 3.5 trillion US dollars, more than 1 trillion US dollars higher than the official data.
Navarro: Three-stage solution to the CCP's "seven sins" US-China trade negotiations are moving toward the first phase of the agreement, and White House trade consultant Peter Navarro said recently that even if the first phase of the agreement goes smoothly, two more At this stage, the structural "seven sins" of the CCP can be completely resolved.
"Down with Xi Jinping" shouted and cried in despair. Xi Jinping, who is now in power, has had a period of despair. At the beginning of the Cultural Revolution, Xi Gang was labeled as a counter-revolutionary when he was 13 years old. At the commemorative meeting held by the Communist Party School of the Communist Party of China, "Dr. Xi Jinping" was crying. My mother was forced to shout slogans and beat her son... A rainy night, the sneaked back home, the mother was frightened, reported the report, and cried desperately. And desperately ran into the rainy night.

"The CCP does not represent the Chinese." Speech by Pompey's Think Tank On October 30th, US Secretary of State Michael R. Pompeo gave a speech at the Hudson Institute in New York, a conservative think tank. He said that the United States has always expected China under the CCP to become a democratic country, thus condoning the CCP in many aspects, but now it is finally realized that the CCP has always been hostile to American values.
Former US Speaker: The CCP is the biggest threat. Pompeo: Must respond positively on Tuesday (October 29). Former US House Speaker Gingrich called on the United States to recognize that the CCP is a totalitarian system and the greatest threat to the United States. The next day, US Secretary of State Pompeo said that the United States has already recognized the CCP’s hostility towards the United States and the fundamental opposition between the US and China’s ideology and will face the CCP positively.
FBI Director: Counter-intelligence pays special attention to or is disturbed by the Chinese Communist Party's general election. The US Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) director Christopher Wray said in a testimony on Congress on Wednesday (October 30) that the FBI is particularly concerned about counter-intelligence (anti-spyware). The CCP also reminded the United States to be alert to the CCP’s dissemination of false news and to interfere with the presidential election next year.
US network security company report: CCP steals overseas mobile phone information politicians also slashed a US well-known network security company released a report on Thursday, disclosed the Chinese hacker organization involved in the CCP government, using a new malware to steal overseas mobile phone users to send The short message and the call record. It is said that not only dissidents and journalists are easily targeted by these hackers, but even some mobile communications of military and political officials in some countries have been stolen by hackers, and victims are often unaware of them.

Let the outside world hear their voice of seeking democracy. The CCP cannot let everyone be silent.

Meng Xiazhou's lawyers met with a setback. The police arrested the police and tried to extradite the eldest daughter of Ren Zhenghua, chairman of the board of directors of Hua Wei, and the financial director of Huawei Group, Meng Xizhou, and is currently in the court hearing stage. Meng’s team of lawyers was extradited to the United States for the suspension of Meng, and the attack on the Canadian police during the initial seizure of Meng’s boat was suspected of illegal. However, court documents on Thursday showed that the Canadian Mounted Police submitted multiple affidavits and categorically denied the relevant allegations of the defense.
Human Rights Organization: The police were indulged in the increasingly serious riots. The anti-send campaign in Hong Kong continued. On the Halloween of October 31, someone initiated a masked party at Lan Kwai Fong in Central. During the period, some Hong Kong residents and journalists were sprayed with pepper by police officers. The agent sprayed directly on the face. In addition, in the demonstrations in Mong Kok, social workers were beaten by the police with batons. Human rights groups say the police have been condoned by excessive use of force. Ye Kwok-ro, a spokesman for the Human Rights Monitor, pointed out that these means of the Hong Kong Government do not help solve the problem and must respond to the core demands of the people.
Hong Kong has promoted the "Water Bill" for police country members to impose sanctions on the deterioration of the situation in Hong Kong. The accused has become a "police country". Three US senators recently proposed the "Hong Kong Be Water Act", which requires "plus" To deal with the Chinese and Hong Kong officials who have oppressed Hong Kong people's basic rights such as speech, assembly, and procession, as well as those who cooperate with them.
Governing Hong Kong is more stringent? After the Fourth Central Committee, the CCP proposed the "fourth plenary session of the Chinese Communist Party", which was just completed, and the first time it proposed "administration of governance" in Hong Kong and Macao. Later, the CCP officials further explained that they should "improve the appointment and dismissal system of the Chief Executive of the SAR."
